summary: Greetings Brother, you look weary. I have something to help you relax, if you're interested
descriptionHtml:
[center][i][size=6][color=#00ff00]Greetings Brother, you look weary.[/color]
[color=#3c78d8] I have something to help you relax, if you're interested[/color][/size]

[/i][color=#00ffff][size=2]Many of you will take this ENBpreset as a joke
but actually it's not,This Enb preset has everything in the right place (it's my [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/73864/?]Lucien ENB[/url] with sky on Acid),
and works perfectly..
[/size][/color]
[color=#0000ff][size=6]If you are here, you are in the right place,just Relax and get [/size][/color][color=#ff00ff][size=6]SKOOMED[/size][/color]
[color=#ff00ff]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/8llpjp2h.jpg[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/TON0KWKh.jpg[/img]

[/color][size=6][color=#00ff00]This is not ordinary ENB,
or maybe it is...if you just let your self go with the vibe
[/color][color=#ff00ff]Skyrim will not look anymore the same or yes, with a skooma drink everyday, 20 different epic weathers,
a lot of different colors and combinations
Sun red that turns green, fog green or light blu,
Rain with Red sky... 
that you will not care about cause all this adventure is just a big Trip 
[/color][color=#00ffff]Spread your magic, embrace your Skooma, role your ehm....[/color][/size][color=#00ffff]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/FDIQ4B3h.gif[/img]
[/color][color=#00ffff][size=5]Listen to the words of your khajiit[/size][/color][color=#ff0000]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/sFP6FHUh.jpg[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/hhRFIKJh.jpg[/img]
[/color][color=#ff00ff][size=5]HOW TO START YOUR TRIP:

get a Skooma...or 2[/size]
[/color][size=3]1 - Download the Archive
2 - From the folder into the archive, take all files and folders and put them into your folder Skyrim  Game
3 - Download the latest ENBvrs from [url=http://enbdev.com/]ENBDEV[/url]
4 - Download the  [url=http://www.dev-c.com/skyrim/enbhelper/]ENBHELPER[/url] and put the enbhelper.dll into the enbseries folder
5 - From the wrapper Folder of the downloaded enbversion take the d3d9.dll and put it into your Skyrim game folder
6 - Go to the data folder and look for the [color=#ff0000]Getskoomed[/color].esp and activate it 
Remember to set properly the d3d9.dll in the skyrimprefs.ini ( mydocuments/mygames/Skyrim )
SET this line or add them if you don't have it
bFloatPointRenderTarget=1
bTreesReceiveShadows=1
bDrawLandShadows=1
bShadowsOnGrass=1
Remember also to low down the brightness in game at ur own taste,and switch off AA and AF in the videocard option setting
ENJOY
Installation If you have NLA
1 - Download the Archive
2 - From the folder into the archive, take all files and folders ECCEPT THE Data and put them into your folder Skyrim  Game
   overwrite when request
3 - Download the  [url=http://www.dev-c.com/skyrim/enbhelper/]ENBHELPER[/url] and put the enbhelper.dll into the enbseries folder
4 - Download the latest ENBvrs from [url=http://enbdev.com/]ENBDEV[/url]
5 - From the wrapper Folder of the enbversion take the d3d9.dll and put it into your Skyrim game folder
ENJOY[/size]
[color=#ff0000][size=5]unistall[/size][/color]
[color=#00ff00][size=3]delete all files you add to your skyrim folder game..never[/size][/color]

[size=6][img]http://i.imgur.com/ctWwHNJh.jpg[/img][/size]
[size=6][img]http://i.imgur.com/w0aLPsUh.jpg[/img][/size]
[size=5][color=#ff00ff]This ENB is compatible with everything eccept other weather system like Climates of tamriel, Purity, Vividweather[/color]
[color=#ff00ff]Or maybe it is...Just get your skooma and try out![/color]
[color=#ff00ff]Let's make Skyrim Pop Out!![/color]

[color=#ffff00]USE IT WITH [/color][/size][color=#ffff00][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/63478/?][size=5]TRUE STORM[/size][/url][size=5] or Enable RAIN in the ENBSERIES.INI[/size][/color]


[color=#ff00ff][img]http://i.imgur.com/3eFfkK1h.jpg[/img][/color][/center][center][color=#00ff00]Credits :
[i][size=2]I want to thank the[b]Skyrim-Italia FB Fanpage[/b]for all the support and help i had testing the ENB on different set up, i don't need to put names , you know who you are!!
 EWALD for his incredible Sweetfx setting  
- Mindflux for his particle patch enb
[b]Matso [/b]
Confidenceman for his NLA presetting (For any permission issues ,i followed the instruction left from autors ) AND of course [b]Boris Vorontsov [/b]for ENB[/size][/i][/color][/center]
author: L3st4t
